axesGap.description: A gap added between axes when multiple axes are rendered on the same side of the chart.

axisHighlight.description: The configuration of axes highlight. Default is set to 'band' in the bar direction. Depends on layout prop.

borderRadius.description: Defines the border radius of the bar element.

colors.description: Color palette used to colorize multiple series.

dataset.description: An array of objects that can be used to populate series and axes data using their dataKey property.

disableAxisListener.description: If true, the charts will not listen to the mouse move event. It might break interactive features, but will improve performance.

grid.description: Option to display a cartesian grid in the background.

height.description: The height of the chart in px. If not defined, it takes the height of the parent element.

hiddenItems.description:
List of hidden series and/or items.
Different chart types use different keys.

hideLegend.description: If true, the legend is not rendered.

highlightedAxis.description: The controlled axis highlight. Identified by the axis id, and data index.

highlightedItem.description: The highlighted item. Used when the highlight is controlled.

id.description: This prop is used to help implement the accessibility logic. If you don't provide this prop. It falls back to a randomly generated id.

initialHiddenItems.description:
List of initially hidden series and/or items. Used for uncontrolled state.
Different chart types use different keys.

initialZoom.description: The list of zoom data related to each axis. Used to initialize the zoom in a specific configuration without controlling it.

layout.description: The direction of the bar elements.

loading.description: If true, a loading overlay is displayed.

margin.description:
The margin between the SVG and the drawing area. It's used for leaving some space for extra information such as the x- and y-axis or legend.
Accepts a number to be used on all sides or an object with the optional properties: top, bottom, left, and right.

onAxisClick.description: The function called for onClick events. The second argument contains information about all line/bar elements at the current mouse position.

event.name: event
event.description: The mouse event recorded on the <svg/> element.

data.name: data
data.description: The data about the clicked axis and items associated with it.

onHiddenItemsChange.description: Callback fired when any hidden identifiers change.

hiddenItems.name: hiddenItems
hiddenItems.description: The new list of hidden identifiers.

onHighlightChange.description: The callback fired when the highlighted item changes.

onHighlightedAxisChange.description: The function called when the pointer position corresponds to a new axis data item. This update can either be caused by a pointer movement, or an axis update. In case of multiple axes, the function is called if at least one axis is updated. The argument contains the identifier for all axes with a data property.

axisItems.name: axisItems
axisItems.description: The array of axes item identifiers.

onItemClick.description: Callback fired when a bar item is clicked.

event.name: event
event.description: The event source of the callback.

onTooltipItemChange.description: The callback fired when the tooltip item changes.

onZoomChange.description: Callback fired when the zoom has changed.

renderer.description: The type of renderer to use for the bar plot. - svg-single: Renders every bar in a <rect /> element. - svg-batch: Batch renders bars in <path /> elements for better performance with large datasets, at the cost of some limitations. Read more: https://mui.com/x/react-charts/bars/#performance

series.description: The series to display in the bar chart. An array of [[BarSeries]] objects.

showToolbar.description: If true, shows the default chart toolbar.

skipAnimation.description: If true, animations are skipped. If unset or false, the animations respects the user's prefers-reduced-motion setting.

slotProps.description: The props used for each component slot.

tooltipItem.description: The tooltip item. Used when the tooltip is controlled.

width.description: The width of the chart in px. If not defined, it takes the width of the parent element.

xAxis.description: The configuration of the x-axes. If not provided, a default axis config is used. An array of [[AxisConfig]] objects.

yAxis.description: The configuration of the y-axes. If not provided, a default axis config is used. An array of [[AxisConfig]] objects.

zoomData.description: The list of zoom data related to each axis.

slotDescriptions.axisLine: Custom component for the axis main line.
slotDescriptions.axisTick: Custom component for the axis tick.
slotDescriptions.bar: The component that renders the bar.
slotDescriptions.barLabel: The component that renders the bar label.
slotDescriptions.exportIcon: Icon displayed on the toolbar's export button.
slotDescriptions.loadingOverlay: Overlay component rendered when the chart is in a loading state.
slotDescriptions.noDataOverlay: Overlay component rendered when the chart has no data to display.
slotDescriptions.tooltip: Custom component for the tooltip popper.
slotDescriptions.zoomInIcon: Icon displayed on the toolbar's zoom in button.
slotDescriptions.zoomOutIcon: Icon displayed on the toolbar's zoom out button.
